name: Action Bot vs Space Insects
description:
The Hydra City colony has been attacked by Space Insects. Only a special ActionBot unit can handle it. You are an OG-25 action bot. A machine for special tasks. Your task is to get rid of the insect invasion and restore order in Hydra City. Special laser guns filled with anti-biological ammunition will help you get rid of pests.Remember that the longer you play, the more dangerous the insect waves are. Search for items that will help you complete tasks leading to key elements. Use teleporters, but remember that insects can also use them. Have fun

Use special ammo to fight insects. Fight with three types of guns stuffed with anti-biological ammunitio
